must_have: Ethnic food ingredients for international recipes
Organic products for all grocery items
nice_to_have: Delivery within a specific time window
Customizable delivery instructions (e.g., leave at the door)
Bulk purchasing options for pantry staples
deal_breakers: Inability to customize or modify orders easily
No option for subscription services on frequently purchased items

technical: Need a feature that maybe tracks my shopping habits or something
I think it should have some kind of app interface, but I’m not sure what that means
Could it have modern tech like AI or machine learning for suggestions? Not really sure how that works though
non_technical: I want it to feel user-friendly and smooth, whatever that means
It should have some community feedback options, but I don’t know if that’s necessary
I heard getting a good deal is important, but I’m not sure how to find that

must_meet: The order should contain all the must-have items, but I’m not clear on what counts as must-have
Delivery should happen at some point, but I don't need to know exactly when
should_meet: I’d like it to show me some alternatives if things are out of stock, but I’m not picky about it
It would be nice if they could offer some discounts, but not absolutely necessary
nice_to_meet: If it lets me interact with social media about my groceries, that would be cool, but not essential
A feature that reminds me of what I usually buy would be great, but I'm unsure how that works
